root.name: Tecmo Bowl Throwback
root.description: This game is an update of the SNES football game Tecmo Super Bowl.GameplayTecmo Bowl Throwback retains the familiar top down view of the football field and features online play, team editor, the ability to play a whole season, and enhanced 3D graphics and an updated user interface.Due to EA Sports' exclusive license with the National Football League, Tecmo Bowl Throwback will feature 32 fictional teams in NFL cities with stats based on the 1993 version of Tecmo Super Bowl (SNES) .FeaturesCustomizable team and player namesOnline season mode leaderboardsOnline versus playHot switching between 2D and 3D visualsLocal multiplayer season and versus play up to 6 players2D and 3D cutscenesFormations and playbooks from the 1993 version of Tecmo Super BowlRelease: April 28, 2010 800 MS points
